name: ALL BUTCHERS
description:
Play cutes butchers pigs which kill themselves to get some pig steaks (Play with sounds :< )

Local Multiplayer Game using InControl

- Left joystick to move
- Jump to jump
- X to pick and throw weapons

Credits : 

Game Design : 
- Paul Hebbinckuys
- Alexandre Kadri

Graphism, Sound Design and UI :

Programming and FX :
